org.opengoss.core
接口 IPluginContext

所有已知实现类：
PluginContext
public interface IPluginContext

A plugin's execution context that is used by the plugin to interact with the OSGi and OpenCore framework.

Get the wrapped OSGi BundleContext by method getBundleContext()

Get the OpenCore IPluginServiceRegistry by method getServiceRegistry

Get the OpenCore IExtensionRegistry by method getExtensionRegistry

版本：
1.0, 2006-11-18
作者：
Ery Lee(ery.lee@gmail.com)

方法摘要
 org.osgi.framework.BundleContext getBundleContext()
          Get the OSGi bundle context.
 IExtensionRegistry getExtensionRegistry()
          Get the plugin extension registry.
 UID getPluginUID()
          Get the plugin UID.
 IPluginServiceRegistry getServiceRegistry()
          Get the plugin service registry.
 

方法详细信息

getPluginUID

UID getPluginUID()
Get the plugin UID.

返回：
UID of the plugin.

getBundleContext

org.osgi.framework.BundleContext getBundleContext()
Get the OSGi bundle context.

返回：
the OSGi bundle context.

getServiceRegistry

IPluginServiceRegistry getServiceRegistry()
Get the plugin service registry.

返回：
the plugin service registry.

getExtensionRegistry

IExtensionRegistry getExtensionRegistry()
Get the plugin extension registry.

返回：
the plugin extension registry.
